name: Heroes and Monsters II
description:
This is Heroes and Monsters II - Medieval. A game with an oldschool playstation/nintendo feel.

Play as a hero or heroine, pick between 6 different classes. Slay the monstrous beasts that roam the land! Adjust difficulty based on your ability and become a legendary hero. Use the keyboard or a gamepad to play.

Available classes (6):

Witchdoctor, Rogue, Warrior, Barbarian, Monk, Hunter

 

Monsters to kill (12):

Man-Eating Bird, Mandrake, Three-headed Troll, Wolf, Lion, Goblin Magician, Griffon, Heretic Swordsman, Heretic Knight, Manticore, Dragon, Death 

Have fun!
